document_data.name: Conceptopolis
document_data.mainbody: '''Conceptopolis''' is an illustration and concept art house based out of Cincinnati, Ohio. They were founded in October of 2006. They were hired to produce some of the art for 5{{th}}-edition [[Dungeons & Dragons]] products.
document_data.See Also: * [[:Category:Images by Conceptopolis|List of images by Conceptopolis]]
